articles.title: Early onset cancer cases rise 80% in past three decades, BMJ survey finds - Financial Times

articles.content: Cases of cancer in the under-50s have surged almost 80 per cent around the world over the past three decades, a survey has found, fuelling a drive to discover the causes of a trend that is placing an… [+3485 chars]
